segmentosSRT.text: I'm not your father. I can't be fooled.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: I've said all there is to say.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text:
Can't you listen just this once?
Quit gambling.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: It's like kicking an opium habit, you know.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text:
Too fast, and boing, you snap!
Could kill you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Only to live a quiet life together.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Fugui, you choose. Gambling or family?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: I just wanted to tell you...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: you'll never change. I can't live like this.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: If the baby is a boy...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: I won't let him be like you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: I don't gamble now. Not even in my next life.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: I know. Or I wouldn't have come back.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: I was just teasing Fugui. It's Youqing.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Jiazhen, it's great to have you back.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Dad didn't give me much money...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: I'll borrow money to set up a shop.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: All I ask is a quiet life together.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text:
kept them fixed on the door,
so sure you'd be back.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: and gave me this job, delivering water.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: The more I deliver, the more I earn.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: It's been hard on the kids.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: For a week, she ran a high fever.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: No one thought she'd pull through.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: It's good to be poor. Nothing like it.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Get a frame for it tomorrow.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text:
The workers deserve entertaining,
don't they?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: You know, I sang for the Liberation Army...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text:
Kids had been bullying Fengxia.
He was defending her.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Do you think I'd let this family go to ruin?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: I've stuck with you through good and bad.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text:
Poor Fengxia.
Can't even talk back to bullies.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing adores her. And you'd hit him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Do you like hearing daddy sing?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Mommy doesn't either. He's so smug.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Let's play a practical joke on him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Take him tea full of vinegar.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: In life, you never had a good night's sleep.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Mommy will come see you every day.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: I shouldn't have let you go to school.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: The one who ran over my son?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: I want my son. Give me back my son.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: You killed him! Give him back to me!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Let's not let her in on it for now.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Fengxia's father took part in the revolution.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text:
The Liberation Army
gave me that certificate.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Who's to say he'll like our Fengxia?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: He only glanced at her, and wouldn't stay.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text:
He doesn't like Fengxia,
so he tears the place down.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: let's make the wedding a real occasion.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: and she can't even join in!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Erxi, when you went to the hospital today...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: what did they say about Fengxia's health?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Still, you can't be too careful.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text:
After the birth,
you'll stay with us for a while.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Spend as much time as you can with her.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: When I was pregnant with Fengxia...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: have a photo taken every year.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text:
Fengxia's about to have a baby.
It's to thank the matchmaker!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Another working class member on the way!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: So we've got to get going.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: We'll bring the baby to see you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: When will they let you return?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: We must find a good doctor.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Fengxia's child won't be mute, will he?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: are not recorded in the Register of Names.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: He doesn't know those kids exist...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: That's what the old folks say.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Okay, then Little Bun it is.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Later, his dad can give him a proper name.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: We said it would be fine!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Fine. Mother and son are fine.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Erxi, seeing as they are both fine...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: why don't you see Dr. Wang back.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: I want to visit Fengxia's grave again...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: Little Bun! Hold onto those chicks.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: she should take a photo every year.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: He always carries on like this.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: won't eat buns, only rice now?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: What a food bill he must have.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20

segmentosSRT.text: You will ride on an ox's back.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_20
